name: Light Technicians Dream
description:
A light wandering and dreamy tribute to  trusty teams of technicians working back stage.

Music   - Alnitak (I Ching) by Uakti

___

- WASD or Arrow Keys to walk around

- Space bar to jump

- Move mouse to look around

A 1- month Game Studio MFA Game Center Walking Sim project

Alina Constantin & Charles H. Huang
